Rule: Act out a scene from a movie. First player to guess the movie correctly picks someone to smoke.
Answer a "would you rather" question or smoke.
Flip a coin. If it’s heads, you smoke. If it’s tails, everyone else smokes.
Give a confession or smoke. If the group doubt the sincerity of the confession, take three smokes.
Hum a song of your choice. First player to guess correctly picks someone to smoke.
Pick a player and start a staring contest. Loser smokes.
Pick a player to play rock, paper, scissors with. Loser smokes.
Imitate a celebrity or take 2 smokes.
Pick a superhero and act out this superhero without talking. First player to guess correctly picks someone to smoke.
Pick an animal and act out this animal without talking. First player to guess correctly picks someone to smoke.
Pick someone and guess the colour of their underwear. If you're right, they smoke. If you're wrong, you smoke.
Pick someone to play a game of thumb war. Loser smokes.
Say the kinkiest thing you've done or smoke.
Do 13 pushups or take 2 smokes.
Show everyone the last five photos on your phone or smoke twice.
Tell a joke. Whoever laughs smokes. If no one chuckles or laughs, you smoke twice.
The player after you can ask you any question. You can either answer truthfully or refuse to answer and smoke.
The player after you can dare you to do anything. You can either fulfil the dare or refuse the dare and smoke.
Without touching anything, everyone must balance on one leg. First player to lose balance smokes.
All players must only speak with one or two-syllable words until someone messes up. That player smokes.
Ask another player a true or false question about yourself. If they answer correctly you smoke, otherwise they smoke.
Everyone guesses what time it is without looking. Whoever is furthest off, smoke.
Everyone must speak in third player until someone messes up. That player smokes.
Imitate another player. First player to guess correctly picks someone to smoke.
Make any action, the next player repeats all previous actions and adds another. Continue on until someone messes up. That player smokes.
On the count of three, start a group staring contest. Last player to blink picks someone to smoke.
Pick a word. Everyone takes turns saying a word that relates to the previous word. The player that hesitates or says a non-relating word smokes.
Pick a word. Everyone takes turns saying a word that rhymes with it. The player that hesitates or repeats a word smokes.
Pick someone and guess the colour of their underwear. If you guess correctly, they smoke, otherwise you smoke.
Pick two people to perform a dance move of your choice. You pick the worst performer to smoke.
Starting with you, take turns naming a colour. Continue until someone hesitates or repeats a colour. That player smokes.
Starting with you, take turns naming a country. Continue until someone hesitates or repeats a country. That player smokes.
Starting with you, take turns naming a fruit. Continue until someone hesitates or repeats a fruit. That player smokes.
Starting with you, take turns naming a land animal. Continue until someone hesitates or repeats. That player smokes.
Starting with you, take turns naming a spice. Continue until someone hesitates or repeats a word. That player smokes.
Starting with you, take turns naming an insect. Continue until someone hesitates or repeats. That player smokes.
Starting with you, take turns naming an ocean animal. Continue until someone hesitates or repeats a word. That player smokes.
Tell two truths and a lie. Everyone can answer and if the first answer is correct, you smoke. Otherwise the player who guessed incorrectly smokes.
You are Simon. Everyone plays Simon Says. First player that messes up smokes.
Everyone democratically votes for a player to smoke.
Everyone votes on who is most likely to spend money on something stupid. That player smokes.
Everyone votes on who is the biggest d**k. That player smokes two smokes.
Everyone votes on who is the most likely to argue with a stranger. That player smokes.
Everyone votes on who is the most likely to be in bed by 10 pm. That player smokes.
Everyone votes on who is the most likely to dodge paying for smokes. That player smokes.
Everyone votes on who is the most likely to get arrested. That player smokes.
Everyone votes on who is the most likely to get thrown out of a bar. That player smokes.
Everyone votes on who is the most likely to have a one-night stand. That player smokes.
Everyone votes on who is the most likely to spend all their money on something stupid. That player smokes.
Everyone votes on who is the nicest. That player picks someone to smoke.
After this card is read, everyone must play in silence until it is your turn again. First player to laugh or talk smokes and ends the silence.
Keep your eyes closed until it’s your turn again. If you open your eyes, smoke.
Make a rule for another player to follow until it is your turn again. Everyone who breaks the rule has to smoke.
The player farthest from you makes a rule for you to follow until it is your turn again. Everyone, smoke if you break the rule.
Make a rule that everyone has to follow until it is your turn again. Everyone who breaks the rule has to smoke.
Talk with an accent until your next turn. If caught not speaking in the accent, you smoke.
Whoever drank in the last round gets to pick two people to smoke (they may pick the same player twice).
No laughing until it’s your turn again. If you do, smoke.
No eye contact with anyone until it’s your turn again. If you do, you smoke.
Smoke! Smoke! Smoke! Everybody smokes!
Everyone except you smokes.
The player after you smokes.
The player before you smokes.
Take three smokes.
Take two smokes.
Take a smoke.
All men smoke.
All women smoke.
Take a smoke if you've ever been on TV.
Everyone smokes for every sibling they have.
The player who has travelled the furthest away this year smokes.
Everyone, smoke if you're afraid of spiders.
Everyone, smoke if you like pineapple on pizza
Whoever has been unemployed the longest, take 2 smokes.
Everyone, smoke if you're unemployed.
Everyone, smoke if you've been in a motor accident.
Everyone, smoke if you've broke a bone.
Everyone, smoke if you currently have dye in your hair.
Everyone, smoke if you're wearing a belt.
Everyone, smoke if you're wearing black.
Everyone, smoke if you've ever eaten from a bin.
Everyone, smoke if your birthday was in the last 6 months.
Everyone, smoke if your birthday is in the next 6 months.
Everyone, smoke if you're wearing white.
Everyone, smoke if you've ever spent over £1,000 in a day.
Everyone born in the same month as you smokes.
Everyone born in the same month as you smokes.
Everyone in a relationship smokes.
Everyone left-handed smokes.
Everyone of the opposite sex smokes.
Everyone older than you smokes.
Everyone younger than you smokes.
Everyone shorter than you smokes.
Everyone wearing a top with buttons smokes.
Everyone wearing a watch smokes.
Everyone wearing glasses smokes.
Everyone wearing jeans smokes.
Everyone wearing the same colour top as you smokes.
Everyone who has a dietary restriction smokes.
Everyone who is shorter than you smokes.
Everyone who is single smokes.
Everyone who is single smokes.
Everyone who is taller than you smokes.
Everyone who is taller than you smokes.
Everyone with an Apple phone, take a smoke. Everyone with an Android phone, take two smokes.
Everyone with facial hair smokes.
Everyone with longer hair than you smokes.
Everyone with tattoos, smoke.
Everyone with the letter "A" in their first name smokes twice.
Everyone, smoke if you’ve ever faked an orgasm.
If your age is an even number, smoke.
The oldest player take a smoke.
On the count of three, everyone holds up either a thumbs up or a thumbs down. Whoever does the opposite of you smokes.
Everyone take a smoke for every pet you have.
On the count of three, everyone says a colour from the rainbow. Whoever says the same colour as you has to smoke.
players who use spotify smoke, players who use apple music take two smokes.
Take a smoke with the player you've known the longest.
The player farthest from you smokes.
The player nearest to you smokes.
The player who is the most depressed picks two other people to smoke (you can pick the same player twice).
The player who most recently posted on social media smokes.
The player who most recently used the bathroom smokes.
The player with the biggest ears smokes.
The player with the biggest hands picks someone to smoke, and takes two smokes.
The player with the largest shoe size smokes.
The player with the longest first name smokes. If there’s a tie you both smoke.
The player with the most smoke in their vessel smokes.
The player with the least smoke in their vessel smokes.
The player with the shortest last name smokes. If there is a tie you both smoke.
The player with the least battery left in their phone takes two smokes.
The players to either side of you smoke.
Everyone wearing a hat smokes.
The youngest player takes a smoke.
Take a number of smokes - from 0 to 3 - to reflect your degree of superstitiousness
Everyone, take a smoke if you're dyslexic.
If you haven't had a smoke yet, take 3 BIG smokes.
Pick a player to smoke.
Tell the sexiest player to take a smoke.
Vote on who the funniest player, they pick someone to smoke.
Make a new rule for the rest of the game. If most players object, take 2 smokes. Rule-break = smoke.
Swap player turn order!
No smokes this turn.
No smokes allowed until the next game-mandated smoke.
Switch places with someone across from you.
Take a break (if you want).
Take a break (if you want).
Take a break (if you want).
Take a break (if you want).
Take a break (if you want).
The player with the most battery left in their phone takes two smokes.
Everyone with a middle name smokes.
Everyone who has ever been on a boat smokes.
Smoke if you’ve ever fallen asleep in public.
Smoke if you've ever had braces.
Smoke if you’ve cried during a movie in the last year.
Everyone who currently has a nickname smokes.
Everyone with an odd number of letters in their first name smokes.
If you can't whistle properly, take 2 smokes.
Smoke if you’ve ever had a speeding ticket.
Everyone who has more than one piercing smokes.
Everyone who’s wearing socks with patterns smokes.
Smoke if you’ve ever worked in retail.
Smoke if you've ever been fired from a job.
Everyone who’s been in a long-distance relationship smokes.
Whoever has come closest to dying, take as many smokes as you like.
Everyone who has a first name starting with a vowel smokes.
Smoke if you’ve ever joined a gym and quit within six months.
Everyone who prefers tea over coffee smokes.
Smoke if you’ve ever lost your phone. If more than one player, cheers!
Everyone who has run a marathon or done a major sporting event smokes.
Smoke if you’ve ever won a trophy or medal.
Everyone, if you have a gym membership, take a smoke (to good health!)
Everyone, if you play a sport, take a smoke (to good health!)
All giants (over 6 ft, 2 in) take a smoke
All shorties (under 5 ft) take a smoke
If you bite your nails, take 2 smokes. If not, chose who takes 2 smokes.
If you've been arrested, take a smoke.
Everyone speak in different accents for 1 round. Whoever fails smokes.
No more pointing. Pointing = smoke.
Nickname Time! Everyone refers to eachother by nicknames. Fail = smoke.
Opposite Hands! Use opposite hands to smoke. Fail = smoke.
Ban a Word! This player bans a word. Speaking banned word = smoke.
Questions Only! Only ask questions until your turn again. Making a statement = smoke.
Speak in Rhyme! Every sentence you say must rhyme until your turn again. Failure = smoke.
On the count of three, everyone strikes a pose. Most boring pose (as judged by the group) smokes.
Spell your surname backwards. Hesitate or mistake = smoke.
Perform a monologue from a movie. First player to guess the movie picks someone to smoke.
Show everyone your most recent browing history or finish your smoke.
Recite the alphabet backwards or take a smoke.
Smoke if you’ve ever had a near death experience.
Whoever shat most recently, take a smoke.
Everyone, take a smoke for every hour that's passed since you last urinated.
Everyone, take a smoke if you read product ingredient labels.
Everyone, take a smoke if your surname ends in an "s".
Everyone, take a smoke if you play games on your phone.
Whoever put the most effort into their appearance, take 2 smokes.
Whoever put the least effort into their appearance, take a smoke.
Everyone, take a smoke if you're wearing colourful socks.
Everyone with shorter hair than you takes a smoke.
Everyone who smokes tobacco takes a smoke.
Whoever has the highest qualification, take a smoke.
Everyone who's smoke is more potent (ABV%) than yours, take a smoke.
Everyone who's smoke is less potent (ABV%) than yours, take 2 smokes.
Everyone who has special dietary requirements, take a smoke.
Everyone with a formal mental health diagnoses, take a smoke.
Anyone who's ever undergone surgery, take a smoke.
Everyone, take a smoke for each allergy you have.
Everyone you point at takes a smoke.
If you want, assign someone who smokes for you this round.
Set a timer for 4 minutes. Whoever's turn it is when it rings smokes.
Vote on who has the most different accent. They take a smoke.
Everyone who has different hair colour from your takes a smoke.
Everyone whose birthday is this month takes a smoke.

Vote on who has the worst outfit. That player takes a smoke.
